name: Shitty Tic Tac Toe
description: Simple tic tac toe game built to explore IIFE and factory function concepts.

name: Where is Waldo
description: A where is waldo game based on pop culture characters. Implemented with React and Rails to exercise the communication between front and back-end. Unfortunately my free back-end host went down.

name: HubStore
description: A fictitious store based on the Fallout series. My second react project, experimenting with routes and interaction between components.

name: Pokemon Memory Card
description: A simple and fun game using the Pokemon API. My first react project.

name: Snake Game
description: Classic game made with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript. Includes score, sounds and different visual styles.

name: MyExpo
description: Virtual gallery using HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript implementing raycast to showcase my projects.
